title: "Viral Wallpapers"
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to our website! 

We're excited to bring you a unique collection of wallpapers that are sure to make your desktop stand out. Our wallpapers feature abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a sleek black background. 

Whether you're looking to add a touch of edge to your workspace or just want something different from the usual landscape or cityscape wallpapers, we've got you covered. Our wallpapers are perfect for anyone who wants to express their individuality and showcase their love for all things tech. 

So why settle for boring wallpaper when you can have something that truly reflects your personality? Browse our collection today and find the perfect wallpaper to make your desktop pop!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
